channel.title: Headers on Cloudflare Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Headers on Cloudflare Docs

item.title: 103 Early Hints
item.description: Allow a client to request static assets while waiting for the HTML response.

item.title: Alter headers
item.description: Example of how to add, change, or delete headers sent in a request or returned in a response.

item.title: Cookie parsing
item.description: Given the cookie name, get the value of a cookie. You can also use cookies for A/B testing.

item.title: CORS header proxy
item.description: Add the necessary CORS headers to a third party API response.

item.title: Hot-link protection
item.description: Block other websites from linking to your content. This is useful for protecting images.

item.title: Logging headers to console
item.description: Examine the contents of a Headers object by logging to console with a Map.

item.title: Modify request property
item.description: Create a modified request with edited properties based off of an incoming request.

item.title: Modify response
item.description: Fetch and modify response properties which are immutable by creating a copy first.
